reviews.review_msg: Great Prof, very approachable. 1 presentation, 1 term paper, 2 midterms (MCQs), participation in tutorial, brownie points to speak up in the class. He is very engaging and very nice. Trick to get good grades, talk to TAs, make notes while he speaks in class because slides wont have all the information, just listen to him carefully.

Great prof! a few things to note:
- lectures were interesting but a lot of information was covered 
- midterms were all multiple choice and quite easy; not so much memorization but more comprehension
- term paper was worth 33% so quite big but not hard
- TA's are very sticky about participation and the tutorial presentation so they marked very hard

Ta marked hard. Lectures weren't recorded but prof was nice. First exam was tough but second was easier, term paper worth 33% of grade is very scary especially with how strict they marked it. Lots of information to go over and study so be ready

The most difficult thing about this course was the amount of reading you had to do. Pablo is a great professor and I enjoyed listening to his lectures. He provides many examples in class which helps the content you learned stick. To do well in this course, go to class, participate and form study groups!! Thank you Pablo for teaching me good habits!

I really enjoyed pablo's class because the content is interesting. He is clearly passionate about teaching, which is great to see. His exams are all MC, but tricky - DO NOT SKIP HIS LECTURES. They can be really long, but exams are based completely off lectures. Also, really long final paper, but no final! Would recommend.

The TA'S are really hard markers and the term paper is worse than writing a final exam. His lectures are confusing and not having a textbook makes this class even more difficult. If you aren't interested in the material after the first lecture then drop the course!
Great prof in lecture but his midterms were difficult. TAs were very harsh on term paper so watch out.

This class was all over the place. Regretted taking it right away but stuck through it. Lectures are 3 hours long and he makes you stay till the end. His TA's are super hard markers too. Good luck if u take this!
